 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָפָא‎</span> **verb** ==heal== (Late Hebrew in derivatives; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רפא‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***heal***; on Aramaic proper name compounded with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רפא‎</span> see [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xi (1886), 723</sup> [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>369</sup>; Sabean proper name <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אלרפא‎</span> Langer<sup>1, 1</sup> [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>ZMG xxxvii (1883), 326</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (and <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) ***darn, mend, repair, pacify***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***stitch together, mend***; compare Küchenmeister<sup>ZWiss. Th. xxx (1887), 257 ff.</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְר‎</span> [[Isa.6.10|Isa 6:10]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּרְפָאָם‎</span> [[Isa.19.22|Isa 19:22]], 1 singular suffix consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּרְפָאתִיו‎</span> [[Isa.57.19|Isa 57:19]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְפָּא‎</span> [[2Kgs.20.8|2Kgs 20:8]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְפָּאֵנוּ‎</span> [[Hos.6.1|Hos 6:1]], 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרְפָּא‎</span> [[Hos.14.5|Hos 14:5]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרְפָּה‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:75pp»§ 75pp</sup>) [[Jer.3.22|Jer 3:22]] 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּרְפֶּינָה‎</span> (Id<sup>ib. qq</sup>) [[Job.5.18|Job 5:18]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְפָא‎</span> [[Num.12.13|Num 12:13]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְפָה‎</span> (Id<sup>ib. pp</sup>) [[Ps.60.4|Ps 60:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְפָאָ֫ה‎</span> [[Ps.41.5|Ps 41:5]], etc.; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָפוֺא‎</span> [[Isa.19.22|Isa 19:22]] ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִרְפֹּא‎</span> [[Hos.5.13|Hos 5:13]], etc.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹפֵא‎</span> [[2Kgs.20.5|2Kgs 20:5]] +, etc.; — ***heal:*** 

**1.** literally, 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** of God, with accusative of person [[Gen.20.17|Gen 20:17]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Ps.107.20|Ps 107:20]] (suffix), with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person [[Num.12.13|Num 12:13]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]) [[2Kgs.20.5|2Kgs 20:5]]; [[2Kgs.20.8|2Kgs 20:8]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** of men, absolute [[Eccl.3.3|Eccl 3:3]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הרג‎</span>); participle as substantive ***healer, physician***, [[Gen.50.2|Gen 50:2]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[2Chr.16.12|2Chr 16:12]]. 

**2.** figurative, ***heal*** hurts of nation, involving <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s (restored) favour (and, often, forgiveness): 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, with suffix person, [[Hos.6.1|Hos 6:1]]; [[Hos.11.3|Hos 11:3]] (yet compare [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]]), [[Exod.15.26|Exod 15:26]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Isa.19.22|Isa 19:22]]b [[Isa.57.18|Isa 57:18]]; [[Isa.57.19|Isa 57:19]]; [[Jer.33.6|Jer 33:6]]; [[Ps.30.3|Ps 30:3]], compare [[Ps.6.3|Ps 6:3]] with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַם‎</span> [[2Chr.30.20|2Chr 30:20]], with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרֶץ‎</span> [[2Chr.7.14|2Chr 7:14]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> of nation [[Hos.7.1|Hos 7:1]], and (indefinite subject) [[Isa.6.10|Isa 6:10]] (lest) ***one heal them*** (= passive, ***they be healed***); with accusative of hurt, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִחַץ מַכָּתוֺ‎</span> [[Isa.30.26|Isa 30:26]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁבָרִים‎</span> (of land) [[Ps.60.4|Ps 60:4]], so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשׁוּבָה‎</span> [[Hos.14.5|Hos 14:5]]; [[Jer.3.22|Jer 3:22]] (including the ***consequences*** of backsliding); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> of hurt [[Ps.103.3|Ps 103:3]] accusative nation (personified) + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of hurt [[Jer.30.17|Jer 30:17]] ***I will heal thee of thy wounds*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרְפָּאֵךְ‎</span>); absolute [[Isa.19.22|Isa 19:22]]a (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נגף‎</span>), [[Deut.32.39|Deut 32:39]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מחץ‎</span>); participle as substantive ***healer, physician*** [[Jer.8.22|Jer 8:22]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** human subject, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> of nation, [[Hos.5.13|Hos 5:13]], compare [[Lam.2.13|Lam 2:13]]. 

**3. a.** figurative, ***heal*** individual distresses, with suffix person [[Jer.17.14|Jer 17:14]], with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַפְשִׁי‎</span> = ***me*** [[Jer.41.5|Jer 41:5]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִשְׁבוּרֵי לֵב‎</span> [[Ps.147.3|Ps 147:3]] (i.e. longing exiles, compare [[Isa.61.3|Isa 61:3]]); absolute [[Job.5.18|Job 5:18]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מחץ‎</span>); participle as substantive [[Job.13.4|Job 13:4]]. **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִרְפָּא‎</span> [[Lev.13.37|Lev 13:37]] +, 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִרְפָּ֑תָה‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:75qq»§ 75qq</sup>) [[Jer.51.9|Jer 51:9]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִרְפּאו‎</span> consecutive [[Ezek.47.8|Ezek 47:8]] ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֵּרָפֵא‎</span> [[Jer.51.8|Jer 51:8]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵרָֽפְאוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.47.9|Ezek 47:9]]; [[Ezek.47.11|Ezek 47:11]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֵּרָפו‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>l.c</sup>.) [[2Kgs.2.22|2Kgs 2:22]], etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵרָפֵא‎</span> [[Jer.15.18|Jer 15:18]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵרָפֵה‎</span> (Id<sup>ib.</sup>) [[Jer.19.11|Jer 19:11]] — ***be healed:*** 

**1.** literally, ==of person== [[1Sam.6.3|1Sam 6:3]] + accusative of disease [[Deut.28.27|Deut 28:27]]; [[Deut.28.35|Deut 28:35]] subject disease [[Lev.13.18|Lev 13:18]]; [[Lev.13.37|Lev 13:37]]; [[Lev.14.3|Lev 14:3]]; [[Lev.14.48|Lev 14:48]] of (bad) water [[2Kgs.2.22|2Kgs 2:22]], salt waters (prediction), i.e. be made fresh, [[Ezek.47.8|Ezek 47:8]]; [[Ezek.47.9|Ezek 47:9]]; [[Ezek.47.11|Ezek 47:11]] of (broken) pottery, i.e. be made whole, [[Jer.19.11|Jer 19:11]] (in simile). 

**2.** figurative, ***be healed:*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** of national hurts, subject city [[Jer.51.8|Jer 51:8]]; [[Jer.51.9|Jer 51:9]] involving forgiveness and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s blessing, impersonal with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> of people, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִרְפָּאלָֿנוּ‎</span> [[Isa.53.5|Isa 53:5]] i.e. ***healing has come to us.*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** of personal distress, subject person [[Jer.17.14|Jer 17:14]], subject the distress [[Jer.15.18|Jer 15:18]]. **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִפִּאתִי‎</span> [[2Kgs.2.21|2Kgs 2:21]] 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְפֵּאתֶם‎</span> [[Ezek.34.4|Ezek 34:4]] 1 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִפִּאנוּ‎</span> [[Jer.51.9|Jer 51:9]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְרַפֵּא‎</span> [[Exod.21.19|Exod 21:19]]; [[Zech.11.16|Zech 11:16]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְרַפֵּא‎</span> [[1Kgs.18.30|1Kgs 18:30]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְרַפְּאוּ‎</span> [[Jer.6.14|Jer 6:14]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְרַפּוּ‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:75qq»§ 75qq</sup>) [[Jer.8.11|Jer 8:11]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַפֹּא‎</span> [[Exod.21.19|Exod 21:19]] — ***have healed, heal***, usually human subject: 

**1.** literal, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַפּאֹ יְרַפֵּא‎</span> [[Exod.21.19|Exod 21:19]] ***he shall have*** (***him***) ***well healed***; with accusative of altar, = ***repair***, [[1Kgs.18.30|1Kgs 18:30]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> of water (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) [[2Kgs.2.21|2Kgs 2:21]]. 

**2.** figurative of healing national defects and hurts, accusative of person, [[Ezek.34.14|Ezek 34:14]]; [[Zech.11.16|Zech 11:16]] ***work at healing, treat*** (accusative of hurt) [[Jer.6.14|Jer 6:14]]; [[Jer.8.11|Jer 8:11]] (both <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלנְֿקַלָּה‎</span>, see [ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָלַל‎</span>] **Niph\`al 2**), [[Jer.51.9|Jer 51:9]]. **Hithpa\`el** ***Infinitive construct*** of purpose, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהִתְרַפֵּא‎</span>, literally, ***in order to get healed***, + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of wounds [[2Kgs.8.29|2Kgs 8:29]] = [[2Kgs.9.15|2Kgs 9:15]], so \|\| [[2Chr.22.6|2Chr 22:6]] (read with [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּי‎</span>, compare [[BDB#Be|Be]] [[BDB#Kau|Kau]] [[BDB#Benz|Benz]]).
